title: Untamed
description: There are a lot of things I don’t want in life: ★ Being without a home.★ Sharing custody of my four-year-old with my ex.★ And anything to do with Barnabas Gritt, AKA Springs Falls Casanova, and my daughter’s favorite person in the world.Of course, he has to be a superhero and save me from being homeless.And of course, I’m expected to fall for him the same way everyone else does. But I won’t go down without a fight—maybe only with a few kisses.***I don’t make promises, not anymore.Most women in town know the deal and enjoy what I have to offer. No complaints.Only stuck-up Avery judges me for it. But when she blurts out that we’re together when we obviously aren’t, she opens the door to a possibility neither of us is ready to explore.And if her daughter already has me under her spell, it only takes me one kiss, to fall hard for the last person I expected.♥ A fake relationship, small town romance in the heart of the Gritt Family with all the raw, the real and the romantic of a Gabrielle G's story. ♥Dive into book 3 in the Gritt Family Series. Can be read as a standalone.
author: Gabrielle G.
